name: UpdateEmailInHubspotCrm
description:
Updates an email object in HubSpot CRM with new property values.

This tool updates properties of an email object in HubSpot CRM, identified by the internal ID or a unique property. Read-only or nonexistent properties will cause errors, and properties can be cleared by passing an empty string.

parameters.name: email_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the email object, either the internal ID or a unique property value.

parameters.name: email_properties_update
parameters.description: JSON object containing key-value pairs to update email properties. Provide property names and their new values. Pass an empty string to clear a property's value.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Name of a unique property for identifying the email object, used instead of default ID.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
